title: Stars Shine Bright In Ireland's Dark Sky Reserve
teaser: The International Dark-Sky Association has named only three "gold-tier reserves" on Earth where a "full array of visible sky phenomena can be viewed." There's only one in the Northern Hemisphere â€” at the the Kerry International Dark Sky Reserve in far Southwestern Ireland.
